items.reviewContent: It is good oven and working good but wrong size advertisement. it cannot make 15 inch pizza. even 14 inch pan fits edge to edge. at maximum, only 13 inch pan fits comfortably. in recipe book the suggested pizza size is 10 to 12 inch, so 15 inch is wrongly advertised. also there is difference in baking suggestion in the manual and recipe book so we dont know which to follow. for example manual suggests to bake cake by top rod only. but recipe book suggests to use both set of rods with convection fan. insulation at front door can also be improved as i noted lot of heat loss front front side door. the dimensions of this 4215 oven are exactly same as told by dawlance for 2515 oven and the pizza size suggested in recipe books of both 4215 and 2515 oven is same i.e. 10 to 12 inch. so i dont know, how this is possible. however oven works and bakes good and i got good deal.
